item.description:
Hello everyone . .

Branford is once again hosting several talented and staged Jazz evenings for the next nine Thursdays
following opening night of Thursday July 1st.

The music is always good, the weather will change but can be so delicious when you catch one of those perfect balmy summer evenings . .

Bring your pic-i-nic basket or grab some take out on the way over, your cooler ( discreet alcohol consumption is permitted), your chair, a friend or two and lets all laugh and breathe and enjoy . ..despite the stresses of the day . .

Starts at 6;30pm and does not go very late, but should be very fun and relaxing night,

Hope to see you here!!!

Glennn


Info for this weeks scheduled performance ( subject to change)


Chris Geith - Smooth Jazz - July 8!






Chris Geith is a keyboardist, composer, music producer, and has collaborated with some of the top music production companies in the USA. His most recent deals have been with "Universal Music" as part of the latest "Weather Channel CD II," and "Top2 Music" in Singapore to expand into the Asian market. Geith's first single "Waves Of Life," from his album "Timeless World," was named Number 1 most added on Smooth Jazz radio in January 08. His music can be heard extensively on the "Weather Channel," "Music Choice" cable, and "Sirius" satellite radio. Geith's latest album, "Island of a Thousand Dreams," will be released in May 2010.

Blue Plate Radio features many of Geith's tracks and we expect he will be featuring many of those tracks from his new CD at the second show of the Branford Jazz on the Green Series!
item.how_to_find_us: probably some type of purple balloon

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Thursday night JAZZ series on the Branford Green
